name: Let Me Eat Breakfast
description:
My final for Game Design class!
This was definitely a risky venture. During class we were initially taught Unity and 3D modeling.  Those were my two weakest areas so when finals rolled around I decided to take a gamble and create a visual novel instead.
I found the free software program Ren'py, learned enough coding to make a basic multiple choice/ending visual novel and executed a workable game!
